mapper.select: SELECT CC.CREW_NUMBER, CU.USER_NUMBER, CC.CREW_NAME, TO_CHAR(CC.CREW_WRITE_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CREW_WRITE_TIME, CC.CREW_CONTENT, CC.CREW_RECRUITMENT, CR.CREW_ROLE_NUMBER, CU.USER_NICKNAME, CR.CREW_ROLE_NAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLEAN_MY_CREW WHERE CREW_NUMBER = CC.CREW_NUMBER AND CREW_ROLE_NUMBER IN (1, 2) ) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM CLEAN_CREW CC JOIN CLEAN_USER CU ON CC.USER_NUMBER = CU.USER_NUMBER JOIN CREW_ROLE CR ON CC.CREW_ROLE_NUMBER = CR.CREW_ROLE_NUMBER
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CLEAN_CREW.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CLEAN_CREW(CREW_NUMBER,USER_NUMBER,CREW_NAME,CREW_WRITE_TIME,CREW_CONTENT, CREW_RECRUITMENT,CREW_ROLE_NUMBER) VALUES (#{crewNumber},#{userNumber},#{crewName},SYSDATE, #{crewContent},#{crewRecruitment},1)
INSERT INTO CLEAN_MY_CREW(CREW_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, CREW_ROLE_NUMBER) VALUES (#{crewNumber},#{userNumber},2)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLEAN_MY_CREW WHERE CREW_NUMBER = #{crewNumber} AND CREW_ROLE_NUMBER IN (1, 2)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLEAN_MY_CREW WHERE CREW_NUMBER = #{crewNumber} AND USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}
